name: Russell's Hustle
description:
You wake up in the middle of a large, dark maze, with no memory of how you got there. You feel that the air is thin, and you just know that you don't have much time left. Find a light and your way out of the maze to try to find something to help you destroy it once and for all. It will be a race against the clock though, so you better hustle.

Note: double-click the game window to lock the cursor.
